overview: Baionarena is a live album and DVD release in 2009 by Manu Chao and Radio Bemba. It was recorded during summer 2008 in the Arena of Bayonne during the FÃªtes de Bayonne, hence the name Baionarena which also happens to mean the one that belongs to Bayonne in Basque.
title: Manu Chao & Radio Bemba Baionarena
